name: Yusuf Za'arur
description: '''Yusuf Za'arur''' ({{Langx|ar|يوسف زعرور}}, {{Langx|he|יוסף זערור}}; ''Yosef Za'arur''; 1902 in [[Baghdad]] –  1969 in [[Israel]]) was a world-renowned [[History of the Jews in Iraq|Iraqi-Jewish]] ''[[Qanun (instrument)|qanun]]'' player and director of Radio Orchestra of [[Baghdad]] during the 1930s.
